name: Last Group Out
description:
Last Group Out is an casual top down shooter that takes place in an abandoned country, torn by economic collapse.

Inspired by "Escape from Tarkov" and "The Escapists".


Go scavenge
- Travel to a hostile land and collect all you can before the timer runs out.
- Use this time to level up your character and build your wealth.

Collect loot
- Find items to help you in your journey.
- Sell items to gain better weapons and equipment.



Hone your skills
- Level up your character by defeating enemies, looting items, and completing quests.
- Unlock new Weapons and Equipment by leveling up or defeating bosses.
- Level up your weapons to gain special buffs.



Stop, Look, Listen, Smell
- Danger lies around every corner, use stealth and your survivalist senses to stay alive.

Play alone or with friends
- Go in solo, or with up to 3 friends to complete quests and level up your character.
